trans-unit.source: Data is derived from Wikipedia (<html></html>http://www.wikipedia.org/<html></html>) based on articles of each S&P 500 company, stored as XML data.<html></html> <html></html>Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:<html></html><html></html>Extract text content for each specific company<html></html><html></html>Remove wiki formatting<html></html><html></html>Remove non-alphanumeric characters<html></html><html></html>Convert all text to lowercase<html></html><html></html>Known company categories were added<html></html><html></html><html></html> <html></html>Note that for some companies an article could not be found, so the number of records is less than 500.
trans-unit.target: Data is derived from Wikipedia (<html></html>http://www.wikipedia.org/<html></html>) based on articles of each S&P 500 company, stored as XML data.<html></html> <html></html>Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:<html></html><html></html>Extract text content for each specific company<html></html><html></html>Remove wiki formatting<html></html><html></html>Remove non-alphanumeric characters<html></html><html></html>Convert all text to lowercase<html></html><html></html>Known company categories were added<html></html><html></html><html></html> <html></html>Note that for some companies an article could not be found, so the number of records is less than 500.
